text: haircare depends on a healthy body
probably the most important thing one
can do to secure good hair is to have a
healthy body that is eating well very
balanced diet eating enough proteins and
minimizing stress stress affects hair
hair and growth the hair follicle is
made of cells the cells grow from the
bottom and they have the root and form
this beautiful filament structure but
each of the cells are filled with
filamentous proteins as proteins that
look like threads and these threads are
a hundred percent protein so coming back
to what you need most important is
protein you need protein to make hair
minimizing stress is another aspect
another part of the equation it's been
measured by Professor Powell in England
using mice and what he's done is he's
put mice in a stressful situation then
he examines the hair fog when he does
that he sees that the hair follicles are
growing rapidly before the scare and
after the scare they stopped growing so
the fright affects how hair grows so
good body health is going to give a good
